issue.title: [C++][Docs] Create installation instructional documentation in Sphinx
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17375](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17375). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1IFk6m97JWZZzFC3UIlLf3sxnXgFoL-l89nqSGl8bE28/edit?usp=sharing>, we need an article which describes the installation of Arrow, via system package managers, project package managers, and the use of a CMake external project. Such documentation needs to include basic caveats if they exist for given methods, but does not need to function as a full tutorial for, say, the use of Homebrew.
